pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Extension (for Package 'SigTree') of Some of the Classes in Package 'phylobase' // Based on (but not identical to) the no- longer-maintained package 'phyext', provides enhancements to 'phylobase' classes, specifically for use by package 'SigTree'; provides classes and methods which help users manipulate branch-annotated trees (as in 'SigTree'); also provides support for a few other extra features.
